description: Make the crunchiest cinnamon toast ever with the help of an air fryer. You'll have a buttery decadent breakfast in minutes, and for pennies! This one's a keeper.
keywords: air fryer chickpeas, apple cinnamon, banana peanut butter, Buttery Cinnamon Toast, Cinnamon toast, cinnamon toast bread, Cinnamon Toast Dessert, Cinnamon Toast In An Air Fryer, cinnamon toast ingredients, cinnamon toast origin, Cinnamon Toast Recipe, Crunchy cinnamon toast, Easy Breakfast, Easy dessert, fast breakfast, fun breakfast idea, sugar, sweet breakfast
name: Air Fryer Cinnamon Toast

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your air fryer to 350Â°F. Add room temperature butter, vanilla, sugar, and cinnamon to a small bowl.
Spread half of the butter on one side of your slice of bread. Make sure to cover the slice from corner to corner.
Take the toast out and spread the remaining butter on the other side, again corner to corner.
